meanings.definition: Relating to the study of ancient writing systems.
meanings.sent1: The paleographic tools helped decipher the old script.
meanings.sent2: Her paleographic skills were essential in analyzing the ancient manuscripts.
meanings.sent3: The paleographic puzzle was challenging but rewarding to solve.
meanings.sent4: His paleographic expertise was a key that unlocked the secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The paleographic research illuminated the history hidden in the ancient texts.

meanings.sent1: The paleographic techniques used by historians were fascinating.

meanings.sent4: His paleographic knowledge was evident in his detailed analysis.
meanings.sent5: The paleographic examination revealed new insights into the manuscript.

meanings.definition: The study of ancient writing systems.
meanings.sent1: Paleographic involves analyzing scripts from different time periods.
meanings.sent2: The professor's lecture on paleographic was informative and engaging.
meanings.sent3: In the library, she immersed herself in paleographic texts.
meanings.sent4: The paleographic course covered various writing styles throughout history.
meanings.sent5: His passion for paleographic led him to explore rare manuscripts around the world.
